title: In-Law Unit / One Bedroom w/ walk in Closet / Bathroom / Entrance
posting_body: On Aug 15, I will have an In-Law Unit available for rent in Redwood City.
The In-Law unit is located in the heart of Mt. Carmel.
The Unit has roughly 650 square feet and is fully equipped with its own entrance, washer and drier, and a walk-in closet.
Please note: This unit does not have a kitchenette, and only a mini-refrigerator is available.
The unit has a private GYM as well.
Fully equipped Smith Machine, Treadmill, Bench Press, and Dumbells.
- Walking Distance from DownTown Redwood City
- Walking Distance to the Train Station
- Walking Distance to Starbucks, Whole Foods, Safeway, ext.
